name: Meeting Request
template_text:
Subject: Meeting Request - [MeetingTopic]

Dear [FirstName] [LastName],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to request a meeting to discuss [MeetingTopic].

**Purpose of Meeting:**
[MeetingPurpose]

**Proposed Agenda:**
1. [AgendaItem1]
2. [AgendaItem2]
3. [AgendaItem3]
[Conditional:AdditionalAgenda]

**Duration:** [Duration] minutes

**Suggested Times:** (All times in [TimeZone])
• [Option1]
• [Option2]
• [Option3]

Would any of these times work for your schedule? If not, please let me know your availability, and I'll adjust accordingly.

[Conditional:RemoteMeeting]

I look forward to our discussion.

Best regards,
[SenderName]
[SenderTitle]
[Department]
[Email] | [Phone]
